item.title: Nymphcompute6547 add a quote by Richard Carlson, Ph.D.
item.description: "The key to a good life is this: If you're not going to talk about something during the last hour of your life, then don't make it a top priority during your lifetime." -- Richard Carlson, Ph.D.

item.title: Nymphcompute6547 add a quote by Richard Carlson
item.description: "Learning to stop sweating the small stuff involves deciding what things to engage in and what things to ignore. From a certain perspective, life can be described as a series of mistakes, one right after another with a little space in between." -- Richard Carlson

item.title: Nymphcompute6547 add a quote by Richard Carlson
item.description: "What interferes with this peaceful feeling is our expectation of reciprocity." -- Richard Carlson

item.title: Nymphcompute6547 add a quote by Richard Carlson
item.description: "Ironically, when you surrender your need to hog the glory, the attention you used to need from other people is replaced by a quiet inner confidence that is derived from letting others have it." -- Richard Carlson
